title: Equi=Tech Balanced Power Supply model 2RQ with rack case
item_description:
Equi=Tech Balanced Power Supply model 2RQ with rack case

  • Equi=Tech Balanced Power Supply Model 2RQ sn#8–004305.
  • The model 2RQ is Equi=Tech’s flagship rack mounted balanced power system, delivering virtually 99% quiet, uninterrupted performance. The 2RQ simply cleans up  incoming power to give your system the purest, most distortion-free result possible.
  • Comes in Rack Case
  • This will become your most valued piece equipment in your Pro Audio inventory!!
